channel.title: Keldagrim
channel.description: [CENTER][IMG]http://keldagrim.net/logo.png[/img] [FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]I would like to welcome you all to our project thread. Our team is composed of four close friends with very similar goals for Keldagrim. Keldagrim is a 317 rsps loading 602 data that will be an economy based server focused around PvM and PvP. We will have plenty of fun and enjoyable content for you guys to enjoy while playing Keldagrim. Keldagrim is nearing its beta stages and we thought it would be a good idea to have some fresh eyes check out our project. We will be doing out best to keep this thread up to date with all our progress but to be safe you can always view our website [URL=http://"http://keldagrim.net/"]here[/URL]. Our website is nowhere near complete, in fact it will have no resemblance to its current looks in the upcoming days. Below you will be able to find our features, recent updates and our media.[/SIZE][/FONT] [IMG]http://keldagrim.net/features.png[/img][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4] -474 maps and objects -602 data (Cache packed) -Mouse Wheel scrolling -6+ minigames for you to take part in -10 bosses for you to fight solo or with friend(s) -3 mini quests (more to come) -Playtime calculator -Clan Chat -In-game gambling system[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=2]Please note that these are not all our feature but what came to my head first.[/SIZE][/FONT] [IMG]http://keldagrim.net/Media.png[/img] on the way [/CENTER]

item.title: Keldagrim
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Wouldn’t go as far as to call this a “project”.

Read full topic

item.title: Keldagrim
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:552147”]Wow your name is so original.

never seen it before[/quote]
Actually, I think the features are much more original than the name.

[quote=“Keldagrim, post:1, topic:552147”]-474 maps and objects
-602 data (Cache packed)
-Mouse Wheel scrolling
-6+ minigames for you to take part in
-10 bosses for you to fight solo or with friend(s)
-3 mini quests (more to come)
-Playtime calculator
-Clan Chat
-In-game gambling system[/quote]
I mean, what server has gambling AND clan chat?
And an in game play time tracker? That must be hella hard to write.

Read full topic

item.title: Keldagrim
item.dc:creator: @Keldagrim Keldagrim
item.description:
@Keldagrim wrote:

[CENTER]
[FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]I would like to welcome you all to our project thread. Our team is composed of four close friends with very similar goals for Keldagrim. Keldagrim is a 317 rsps loading 602 data that will be an economy based server focused around PvM and PvP. We will have plenty of fun and enjoyable content for you guys to enjoy while playing Keldagrim. Keldagrim is nearing its beta stages and we thought it would be a good idea to have some fresh eyes check out our project. We will be doing out best to keep this thread up to date with all our progress but to be safe you can always view our website [URL=http://“http://keldagrim.net/”]here[/URL]. Our website is nowhere near complete, in fact it will have no resemblance to its current looks in the upcoming days. Below you will be able to find our features, recent updates and our media.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]
-474 maps and objects
-602 data (Cache packed)
-Mouse Wheel scrolling
-6+ minigames for you to take part in
-10 bosses for you to fight solo or with friend(s)
-3 mini quests (more to come)
-Playtime calculator
-Clan Chat
-In-game gambling system[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=2]Please note that these are not all our feature but what came to my head first.[/SIZE][/FONT]

on the way
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
